CustomField.description: This is used in the conga composer to determine which template is used.
CustomField.formula:
IF(
ISPICKVAL(Shared_Solar_System__r.Product__r.Program__c,"SMART - Community Solar"),"a2F0a000000OHZeEAO",
CASE(Utility__c, "Consolidated Edison", "a2F5b000001WPDVEA4", "Eversource (East)","a2F0a000001RC7W,a2F0a000000OaV5EAK", "Eversource (West)","a2F0a000001RC7W,a2F0a000000OaV5EAK", "National Grid (MA)","a2F0a000001RBod,a2F0a000000OaVAEA0", "NYS Electric and Gas","a2F0a000000OY5fEAG", "Orange and Rockland","a2F0a000000OYv9EAG", "National Grid (NY)", IF(Shared_Solar_System__r.UCB__c,"a2F5b000001WAtTEAW","a2F0a000000OYzBEAW,a2F0a000000OYzGEAW"), "Central Hudson Gas and Electric", "a2F0a000000Ob66EAC", "" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used in the conga composer to determine which template is used.
CustomField.label: Conga Template ID
